fields.name: > :one: Act mature.
fields.value: > Occasional jokes are fine, but there is a line. This is not a meme server. Donâ€™t be excessively childish or try to trick people into something.

fields.name: > :two: Keep discussion in English.
fields.value: > We cannot moderate other languages. If you're talking to someone in a different language, please take the discussion to DMs.

fields.name: > :three: Do not post any sort of NSFW content.
fields.value: > This also includes things on your profile such as your avatar.

fields.name: > :four: Don't spam.
fields.value: > This one should be obvious, but don't post messages rapidly or use a load of emojis/reactions. A good rule is more than 5 is a waste.

fields.name: > :five: Do not abuse mentions.
fields.value: > Only ping the Central Core role when a user is breaking the rules. `@everyone` and `@here` are turned off, don't try to use them.

fields.name: > :six: Don't ask to ask a question.
fields.value: > Just ask it, we're here to help.

fields.name: > :seven: Know what you're talking about when giving help
fields.value: > For example: don't try to help people with Hammer unless you actually use hammer

fields.name: > :eight: Please do not use this server for bug reports or feature requests.
fields.value: > These should be posted on the Issues page of the correct GitHub repositories (More information below).
